problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,点D、E分别在边AB、BC上,DE∥AC,若DB=4,AB=6,BE=3,则EC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the points D and E are on the edges AB and BC respectively, DE ∥ AC, if DB = N_0, AB = N_1, BE = N_2, then the length of EC is ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理．注意掌握各比例线段的对应关系是解此题的关键．
